entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:57 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 02:00 AM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
